nodes.text: Bounty Hunt is a children's activity book that follows the bounty hunter Bossk as he pursues a fugitive on Tatooine. It was first published by Egmont UK Ltd in the United Kingdom on April 7, 2016. Disney–Lucasfilm Press released a United States edition on June 13, 2017.

Lift the flaps to explore the Star Wars universe! Follow Bossk, the famous bounty hunter, in his pursuit of a fugitive on Tatooine. Discover all about this world and its famous locations, creatures and secrets. On each spread there are various flaps to lift to reveal new information, and find clues to help Bossk find his target.
